newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barley weekly export sales highlights--USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barley weekly export sales highlights--USDA.

text.p: USDA barley export sales highlights in latest reporting week:
Net sales reductions of 4,000 MT resulted as increases for Saudi Arabia (51,200 MT) were offset by decreases for unknown destinations (55,000 MT) and Cyprus (200 MT).
Exports of 76,000 MT were up 7 percent from the prior week and 91 percent from the 4-week average. The destinations were Saudi Arabia (51,200 MT) and Cyprus (24,800 MT).
